PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-03671998-03-130,  ,  ,  TB, 
PrecisAmendments to the WORK FORCE ADJUSTMENT DIRECTIVE which provide for the payment of a Transitional Allowance to employees of the Department of National Defence at the airfield in Goose Bay, Labrador, who accept an offer of employment from a new employer under a transitional employment arrangement.
Attachments
